actions.name: Wind Slash
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit 5 ft. or range 60' one target 9 (2d4+4) slashing damage + 7 (2d6) lightning or thunder (the peri’s choice).

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.desc: Magically turns invisible until it attacks or uses Storm Wave or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the peri wears or carries is invisible with it.

actions.name: Storm Wave (1/Day)
actions.desc: Throws its arms forward releasing a blast of stormy wind in a 30' line that is 5 ft. wide. All in line make a DC 12 Dex save. On a failure a creature takes 7 (2d6) lightning and 7 (2d6) thunder and is pushed up to 10 ft. away from the peri. On a success a creature takes half the damage and isn’t pushed.

special_abilities.name: Elemental Demise
special_abilities.desc: If the peri dies its body disintegrates into a warm breeze leaving behind only the equipment the peri was wearing or carrying.
